name: Outdoor InSite
tag_list: social-media, mapping, interactive-mapping, fishing, outdoor-recreation, fishing-data, fishing-maps
overview:
Outdoor InSite LLC are the creators, owners, and operators of the Fishidy Technology Platform. Fishidy.com is a geo-social network dedicated to outdoor recreation.

Fishidy.com, a social media website with an emphasis on location-based information (LBI) and outdoor recreation. Fishidy.comâ€™s web presence will serve to build an online community for the avid outdoors person. The website will provide the following benefits to its members:

â€¢ Access to Fishing Hot Spots accurate, detailed digital waterway maps loaded with information to help you get on fish quickly. â€¢ Social-Networking sharing capabilities that allow you to share fishing reports with your fishing buddies, your fishing club, or keep to yourself â€¢ Enter and display reports, posts, and catches in a map view, as well as a text view â€¢ Access to location based data and services including routing, where to fish, businesses, weather, and rules and regulations
